channel.title: Help with penguinscape v5
channel.description:
ok i got it running and im playing all by myself the owner told meto go here..
my question- How can i play with other people?

item.title: Help with penguinscape v5
item.dc:creator: @cmonblaze cmonblaze
item.description:
@cmonblaze wrote:

coming to me… i made a no-ip name but will they have to download the clients toplay on my no-ip?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

People coming to you or to another server?

item.title: Help with penguinscape v5
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

lol i know the owner… rs w00dcut… he’s my friend…

You need to open a port for the players to come in, and then you need to advertise it… so people actually go on it…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with penguinscape v5
item.dc:creator: @ricky_james ricky james
item.description:
@ricky_james wrote:

[quote=“doggyfan24tj, post:5, topic:158199”][quote author=ricky james link=topic=215612.msg1879886#msg1879886 date=1194936430]

[quote author=doggyfan24tj link=topic=215612.msg1879883#msg1879883 date=1194936365]

[quote author=ricky james link=topic=215612.msg1879878#msg1879878 date=1194936132]

ok i got it running and im playing all by myself the owner told meto go here…

my question- How can i play with other people?
[/quote]Port forward and go and put it on a server status page.

well make sure u got a no-ip if not go to www.no-ip.org ans setup account and then log in and on the left hand side hit add and out in wut u want ur ip to be. and then creat it and then post it on server page and let it run hope people come on also if u are using a wireless thing u must port forward but if u don’t got one don’t worry about it
[/quote]You dont need no-ip and btw its called a modem you retard and its runs off dsl and cable so 90% have a modem
[/quote] well sorry mr. I know it all and u do need a no-ip or someone other one but u do have to have one. well I got a modem and I don’t gotta portforward so it depends and also if u wish to discuss this matter more plz send me a message in my inbox cuse I wish not to spam other people topics about stuff they need to know about[/quote]It’s not spam im telling him not dl kb’s that he wont use to slow down his comp and a fact you need to portforward for modem’s becuase you need open port unless your modem that lets you open ports right away that goes from what you running

Read full topic

item.title: Help with penguinscape v5
item.dc:creator: @doggyfan24tj doggyfan24tj
item.description:
@doggyfan24tj wrote:

[quote=“ricky james, post:4, topic:158199”][quote author=doggyfan24tj link=topic=215612.msg1879883#msg1879883 date=1194936365]

[quote author=ricky james link=topic=215612.msg1879878#msg1879878 date=1194936132]

ok i got it running and im playing all by myself the owner told meto go here…

my question- How can i play with other people?
[/quote]Port forward and go and put it on a server status page.

well make sure u got a no-ip if not go to www.no-ip.org ans setup account and then log in and on the left hand side hit add and out in wut u want ur ip to be. and then creat it and then post it on server page and let it run hope people come on also if u are using a wireless thing u must port forward but if u don’t got one don’t worry about it
[/quote]You dont need no-ip and btw its called a modem you retard and its runs off dsl and cable so 90% have a modem[/quote] well sorry mr. I know it all and u do need a no-ip or someone other one but u do have to have one. well I got a modem and I don’t gotta portforward so it depends and also if u wish to discuss this matter more plz send me a message in my inbox cuse I wish not to spam other people topics about stuff they need to know about

Read full topic
